mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.description, a.name, a.type, a.is_active as isActive, a.status, a.cientity_count as ciEntityCount, a.error as error, a.fcd, a.fcu, a.lcd, a.lcu from cmdb_group a join cmdb_ci_group b on a.id = b.group_id where b.ci_id = #{value} and a.is_active = 1
select a.id, a.is_active as isActive, a.name, a.type, a.description, a.cientity_count AS ciEntityCount, a.status from cmdb_group a where server_id = #{serverId} and status = #{status}

where.if: and (a.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or a.description LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))

mapper.select:
select a.id, a.is_active as isActive, a.name, a.type, a.description, a.cientity_count AS ciEntityCount, a.error, a.status from cmdb_group a
LIMIT #{startNum},#{pageSize}

select a.id, a.is_active as isActive, a.name, a.type, a.description, a.cientity_count AS ciEntityCount, a.status AS status, a.error as error, b.id as ciGroupId, b.ci_id as ciId, b.rule as ruleStr, c.group_id as authGroupId, c.auth_type as authType, c.auth_uuid as authUuid from cmdb_group a left join cmdb_ci_group b on a.id = b.group_id left join cmdb_group_auth c on a.id = c.group_id where a.id = #{value}
select a.id, a.ci_id AS ciId, a.group_id AS groupId, a.rule AS ruleStr FROM cmdb_ci_group a JOIN cmdb_group b ON a.group_id = b.id AND b.is_active = 1 WHERE a.ci_id = #{value}
mapper.update: update cmdb_group set name = #{name}, type = #{type}, description = #{description}, is_active = #{isActive}, lcd = now(3), lcu = #{lcu} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into cmdb_group (id, name, type, description, is_active, cientity_count, status, fcd, fcu) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{type}, #{description}, #{isActive}, 0, #{status}, now(3), #{fcu})
insert into cmdb_ci_group (id, ci_id, group_id, rule) values (#{id}, #{ciId}, #{groupId}, #{ruleStr})
insert ignore into cmdb_cientity_group (cientity_id, group_id, ci_group_id) values (#{ciEntityId}, #{groupId}, #{ciGroupId})
insert ignore into cmdb_group_auth (group_id, auth_type, auth_uuid) values (#{groupId}, #{authType}, #{authUuid})
mapper.delete: delete a,b,c,d from cmdb_group a left join cmdb_ci_group b on a.id = b.group_id left join cmdb_cientity_group c on a.id = c.group_id left join cmdb_group_auth d on a.id = d.group_id where a.id = #{value}
